main.name: <akhil madineni/>
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: COmputer Science Student in the Sacramento area, specializing in Machine Learning and the NERDS stack (Node.js, Express, React, and Database using SQL).I love clean code, learning new things, strong engineering culture, and even stronger coffee.Feel free to check out some of my recent projects and reach out if you'd like to grab a cup sometime!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Related coursework: Data Visualization, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, , Data Structures, UNIX Programming in C, Computer Forensics, Data Models for Database Management Systems, Computer Systems Architecture, Algorithms and Paradigms
Related coursework: Data Mining, Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Computing.

work.title: Graduate Student Assistant

work.title: Android Application Developer Intern
description: Involved in the end to end implementation of the mobile application “Student Fee Portal” gaining good experience in the areas of requirements gathering, design, development, testing and deployment.
Completely responsible for Credit/Debit card payment feature – most critical to the application.
Constantly improved the application based on the user feedback to make it more user friendly and reliable.

Projects.description: Built a website to showcase my resume.
Projects.name: github

Projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to help predicting the time remaining for laboratory earthquake Mean Absolute Error 2.51848 Kaggle Rank: 381 Methodology used: Random Forests.
Projects.name: github

Projects.company: Security Incidents and Data Breaches Dash Board
Projects.description: An Interactive visualization dashboard featuring occurrences of security incidents, industry level analysis, types of attacks, the assets being targeted over a period of time and the data trends changes in  all these features.Implemented interactive feature like data slider, hover over feature, brush and used IntroJs for giving a quick demo about the website.
Projects.name: github

Projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to help the system detect the type of the server request viz. normal, intrusion, Neptune, back etc. and bypass them.Approaches of Binary Classification to multi-label classification were applied on the data to achieve better results. Applied KNN, SVM, Dense Neural Network, CNN.F1- Score Achieved: 96%.
Projects.name: github

Projects.description: This project is part of my data visualization course in which crypto currency data is visualized using line charts.Successfully implemented interactive features like data slider, hover over feature.Live Cryptocurrency data is used in this project with the help of crypto compare API.
Projects.name: github

Projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict the stock prices of 8th day or 64th day using 7-Day window to 63-Day window of the time-series data.RMSE score: 1.72.Methodologies used: Dense neural Network, Long Short-Term Memory(LSTM), CNN(each attribute as a channel
Projects.name: github

Projects.description: Built a web application which creates private chatroom for people to chat.Deployed this application to Heroku.And the source code to GitHub.Implemented a feature to get login/ logout details of each user using Socket.IO( A JavaScript library).
Projects.name: github

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
